equip.name: Power Potion
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Increase power:Automatically used after purchased, giving 30 physical attack, 5% of physical lifesteal. Lasts 120 seconds. Only one potion effect can be used at any one time.

equip.name: Magic Potion
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Increase power:Automatically used after purchased, giving 30 magic power, 5% of cooldown reduction. Lasts 120 seconds. Only one potion effect can be used at any one time.

equip.name: Odd Potion
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Success:Purchase this item and you will be immune when inflicted by an allied Jawhead.

equip.name: Broken Heart
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Success:After purchasing, Cecilion will not be able to use Moonlit Waltz on you during this game.

equip.name: Rock Potion
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Increase power:Automatically used after purchased, adds 500 points to Max HP and reduces 15% of CC time. Lasts 120. Only one potion effect can be used at any one time.

equip.name: Hunter's Knife
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Greed:Gain extra 15% EXP when jungling.

equip.name: Wooden Mask
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Devotion:Obtain 2 EXP and Gold every 4s. In the first 12 minutes of the match, this equipment makes you gain nothing from Minions or Creeps if there are teammates without Roaming Equipment, or those with but have higher EXP or Gold than yours around you. They will share the whole EXP or Gold.

Unique Passive-Thriving:Gains extra 15% Gold and EXP with Assists. When your Gold ranks the 5th in your team, increase Gold you gain to 20 per 4s. When your EXP ranks the 5th in your team, increase EXP you gain to 35 per 4s.

equip.name: Ogre Tomahawk
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Angry:Basic Attack will increase Movement Speed by 10%.

equip.name: Magic Blade
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Lifeline:Once the heroâ€™s HP falls below 30% they generate a shield that absorbs 280~700 points of damage (increases with level) that lasts for 3 seconds. CD is 40 seconds.

equip.name: Demon Hunter Sword
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Devour:Basic attacks will deal 9% of the target's current HP as additional physical damage (up to 60 against creeps and minions).
Unique Passive-Devour:Each Basic Attack grants 4% Physical Lifesteal for 3s. Stacks up to 5 times.

equip.name: Deadly Blade
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Life Drain:Basic Attack reduces HP Regen Effect by 50% for 3s.

equip.name: Corrosion Scythe
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Corrosion:Basic Attack has 50% probability of slowing the enemy unit by 30%. Long-ranged Basic Attack only slows enemies by 15%.
Unique Passive-Impulse:When each Basic Attack deals damage to enemies, increase Attack Speed by 8%. Stacks up to 5 times. Lasts 3s.

equip.name: Golden Staff
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Swift:Unable to increase critical chance. Every 1% of critical chance gained will increase attack speed by 1%.
Unique Passive-Endless Strike:Normal basic attacks add a stack of Endless Strike. After accumulating 2 stacks of Endless Strike, the effect of the next basic attack is triggered 3 times.

equip.name: Greedy Crusher
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Warcry:Each basic attack grants 10 HP
Unique Passive-Eliminate:Kill minions and creeps to gain extra 15% gold

equip.name: Wind of Nature
skill_tips: Active Skill-Wind Chant: Immune to all Phy.DMG. Last 2s.(Duration becomes half when used by non-marksmen). CD 80s

equip.name: Evil Hunter
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Life Drain:Basic Attack reduces HP Regen Effect by 50% for 5s.
Unique Passive-Armor Buster:Basic Attack will ignore 20% of a Turret's Defense.

equip.name: Azure Blade
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Judgement:After using a skill, the next Basic Attack deals 50 extra True Damage. CD: 1.5s.

equip.name: Elegant Gem
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Gift:Regens 20% HP and Mana within 2 seconds of leveling up.

equip.name: Enchanted Talisman
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Mana Spring:Regenerates 12% of Max Mana every 10s in total.

equip.name: Winter Truncheon
skill_tips: Active Skill-Frozen: Freeze upon using. The hero can't do anything but will be immune to all DMG and debuff. Last 2s, CD 100s

equip.name: Feather of Heaven
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Affliction:Basic Attack will deal 40% of the hero's Magic Attack as extra Magic Damage.

equip.name: Necklace of Durance
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Life Drain:Reduces the regen effect of enemies with skill damage by 50% for 3s.

equip.name: Molten Essence
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Burning Soul:Deals 1% Magic Damage equal to the Max HP to nearby enemies per second. The damage will increase 50% to Minions.

equip.name: Dreadnaught Armor
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Deter:When an enemy hero attacks, reduces Physical & Magic Attack by 4%. This effect lasts 2s. Stacks up to 3 times.

equip.name: Blade Armor
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Vengeance:Deals 25% of opponent's physical attack as physical damage to an attacker when a basic attack is received.

equip.name: Queen's Wings
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Demonize:Reduces damage taken by 50% when health is less than 40% and increases your Physical Lifesteal by 30%. Lasts 5 seconds. This effect has a 50 second cooldown.

equip.name: Thunder Belt
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Thunderbolt:After using skills, the next Basic Attack deals extra True Damage equal to 2% of the user's Max HP. The enemy target and their surrounding units all take this damage and are slowed for 1.5s. This effect cools down every 1.5s.

equip.name: Warrior Boots
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Valor:Physical defense will go up 5 with each basic attack received, for an increase of up to 25 points. Lasts 3 seconds.

equip.name: Tough Boots
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Fortitude:Reduces time controlled 30%

equip.name: Rapid Boots
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Side Effect:Dealing or taking damage slows hero's movement speed by 40 points. Lasts 5 seconds.

equip.name: Demon Shoes
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Mysticism:Eliminations of enemy heroes and assists regenerates heroâ€™s mana by 10%, while eliminating minions regenerates 4% of the heroâ€™s mana.

equip.name: Curse Sword
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Greed:Gain extra 25% EXP when jungling. After killing Creeps, recovers HP by 4% and Mana by 10%.

Unique Passive-Success:Makes the Battle Spell 'Retribution' applicable to heroes, reducing the target's movement speed by 70% (effect decays over 3s) and reducing target's Magic Defense. Buying other advanced jungling equipment will disable this effect.

equip.name: Pillager Axe
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Greed:Gain extra 25% EXP when jungling. After killing Creeps, recovers HP by 4% and Mana by 10%.

Unique Passive-Success:Makes the Battle Spell 'Retribution' applicable to heroes, reducing the target's movement speed by 70% (effect decays over 3s) and for a short period of time grants a shield based on Max HP. Buying other advanced jungling equipment will disable this effect.

equip.name: Nimble Blade
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Greed:Gain extra 25% EXP when jungling. After killing Creeps, recovers HP by 4% and Mana by 10%.

Unique Passive-Success:Makes the Battle Spell 'Retribution' applicable to heroes, reducing the target's movement speed by 70% and dealing a small amount of True Damage to the target within 3 seconds. Buying other advanced jungling equipment will disable this effect.

equip.name: Iron Mask
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Devotion:Obtain 2 EXP and Gold every 4s. In the first 12 minutes of the match, this equipment makes you gain nothing from Minions or Creeps if there are teammates without Roaming Equipment, or those with but have higher EXP or Gold than yours around you. They will share the whole EXP or Gold.

Unique Passive-Thriving:Gains extra 25% Gold and EXP with Assists. When your Gold ranks the 5th in your team, increase Gold you gain to 20 per 4s. When your EXP ranks the 5th in your team, increase EXP you gain to 35 per 4s.

equip.name: Malefic Roar
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Armor Buster:Basic Attack will ignore 20% of a Turret's Defense.

equip.name: Haas's Claws
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Insanity:When HP drops below 40%, the hero will receive extra 10% Physical Lifesteal.

equip.name: Berserker's Fury
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Doom:Crit hit will increase the hero's Physical Attack by 5% for 2s.

equip.name: Endless Battle
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Divine Justice:After using a skill, the next Basic Attack will deal extra 85% of Physical Attack as True Damage. This effect has a CD of 1.5s.
Unique Passive-Chase Fate:When Divine Justice's effect is triggered, it will increase the hero's movement speed 10%.

equip.name: Windtalker
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Typhoon:Every 5s, Basic Attack hits 3 enemy units and deals 150 points of [C3Magic Damage]. This effect's CD drops as your Crit Chance rises, while damage rises as Attack Speed rises. (Deals 100% more Damage to Minions.)
Unique Passive-Activate:Each time Typhoon is cast, one's movement speed will be increased 5% for a short time.

equip.name: Scarlet Phantom
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Frenzy:Crit hits increase the hero's ATK Speed by 30% and Crit Chance by 5%. Lasts 2s.

equip.name: Blade of the Heptaseas
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Ambush:Next Basic Attack will deal extra Physical Damage equal to 100% of Physical Attack if no damage taken or dealt within 5s.

equip.name: Blade of Despair
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Despair:Attacking enemy units that have HP below 50% will increase hero's Physical Attack by 25%. Lasts 2s. (Takes affect before damage is dealt)

equip.name: Hunter Strike
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Retribution:Deals damage to an enemy hero or Creep for 5 times in a row and improves Movement Speed by 30% for 3s. This effect has a CD of 15s.

equip.name: Goldshine Hammer
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Ambush:After leaving the combat, the next basic attack deals extra 120% attack damage to an enemy hero. The damage will be taken equally by the target and nearby enemies.

equip.name: Rose Gold Meteor
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Lifeline:Once the hero's HP falls below 30% they generate a shield that absorbs 510~1350 points of damage (increase with level) that last for 3 seconds.CD is 40 seconds

equip.name: Sea Halberd
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Life Drain:Basic Attack reduces HP Regen Effect by 50% for 3s.

equip.name: Divine Glaive
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Spellbreaker:When HP is higher than 70%, the unique bonus effect is increased by 30%

equip.name: Holy Crystal
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Mystery:Increases Magic Attack by 21%~35% (Scales with level).

equip.name: Concentrated Energy
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Recharge:Kill enemy hero to recover HP by 10%.

equip.name: Ice Queen Wand
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Ice Bound:Skills that deal damage to an enemy hero will slow them by 15%. This effect lasts 3s. Stacks up to 2 times.

equip.name: Glowing Wand
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Scorch:Skill Damage will burn targets for 3s, dealing 1%/1.75%/2.5% of the target's Max HP as Magic Damage per second. (10 damage minimum).

equip.name: Calamity Reaper
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Calamity:After using a skill, the next Basic Attack deals extra True Damage that equals to 120% Magic Attack. CD: 1.5s. Briefly raises Movement Speed by 10%.

equip.name: Clock of Destiny
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Time:Adds 30 HP and 5 magic attack every 30 seconds. Up to 10 times.
Unique Passive-Reincarnate:If Time reaches Max, then the hero will receive extra 5% Magic Attack and 300 Mana.

equip.name: Blood Wings
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Nirvana:Adds 1.5 HP for every 1 pt of magic power added.

equip.name: Fleeting Time
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Timestream:After an elimination or an assist, the CD of the heroâ€™s ultimate is immediately reduced by 30%.

equip.name: Lightning Truncheon
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Resonate:Every 6s, next Magic Skill deals extra Magic Damage to up to 3 enemies that scales with hero's Max Mana.

equip.name: Genius Wand
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Magic:Dealing damage to enemy heroes will reduce 3~10 points of their Magic Defense (Scales with level). This effect lasts 2s. Stacks up to 3 times.

equip.name: Cursed Helmet
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Burning Soul:Deals 1.5% Magic Damage equal to the Max HP to nearby enemies per second .The damage will increase 50% to Minions

equip.name: Guardian Helmet
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Recovery:Regenerates 1.5% of hero's Max HP. Eliminating enemy heroes raises regeneration rate by 0.4%, while assists raises the rate by 0.2% (includes eliminations and Assists prior to purchase), up to 3.5%. This effect wears off after 5s of the hero taking damage.

equip.name: Antique Cuirass
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Deter:When an enemy hero attacks,reduces Physical & Magic Attack by 6%.This effect lasts 2s.Stack up to 3 times

equip.name: Oracle
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Bless:Raises shield absorption and HP regeneration effects by 30%.

equip.name: Athena's Shield
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Shield:Get a shield of 170~1150 points every 30s. Shield absorption amount grows as the match goes on.

equip.name: Dominance Ice
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Arctic Cold:Lowers movement speed 10% and lowers attack speed 30% for nearby enemy heroes.

equip.name: Immortality
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Immortal:Resurrect 2s upon death and get 15% HP and a shield that can absorb 300~1000 points of damage. (Scales with hero level) Shield lasts 3s. This effect has a CD of 180s.

equip.name: Brute Force Breastplate
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Brute Force:Casting a skill or using Basic Attacks will increase Movement Speed by 3%, Physical & Magic Defense by 4. Lasts 4s. Stacks up to 5 times.

equip.name: Twilight Armor
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Defiance:Physical Damage taken will not exceed 900 points. The CD is 4s.

equip.name: Star Shard
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Recharge:Kill enemy hero to recover HP by 10%.
Unique Passive-Greed:Gain extra 25% EXP when jungling. After killing Creeps, recovers HP by 4% and Mana by 10%.

Unique Passive-Success:Makes the Battle Spell 'Retribution' applicable to heroes, reducing the target's movement speed by 70% (effect decays over 3s) and reducing target's Magic Defense. Buying other advanced jungling equipment will disable this effect.

equip.name: Beast Killer
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Impulse:Deals 100 points of Magic Damage at least to enemies nearby (increases with hero level) and slows them by 30% when taking 10% damage of Max HP. Lasts 2s. The effect activates every 2s.

equip.name: Raptor Machete
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Breakout:For each 10s, Hero's next Basic Attack will deal extra 50 points of True Damage at least (increases with hero level) and slow enemies by 30%. Lasts 1s. Performing Basic Attacks will reduce its cooldown.
Unique Passive-Greed:Gain extra 25% EXP when jungling. After killing Creeps, recovers HP by 4% and Mana by 10%.

Unique Passive-Success:Makes the Battle Spell 'Retribution' applicable to heroes, reducing the target's movement speed by 70% and dealing a small amount of True Damage to the target within 3 seconds. Buying other advanced jungling equipment will disable this effect.

skill_tips: Active Skill-Conceal: Conceals you and your teammates nearby and increases Movement SPD by 15% for 5s. Dealing or taking damage will end the state. Cooldown: 80s. This effect prevents hero from benefiting from Conceal and Encourage again in 80s.

During the mark time, this hero will be stunned for 1.5s when attacked 5 times by you or your teammates. Cools down every 40s.
